author: cms-l1t-offline
body:
90x PR: Updated L1TGlobalUtil to now also access L1T prescales from payloads, using GlobalTag. Example: 
cmsRun L1Trigger/L1TGlobal/test/runGTSummary.py
Automatically ported from CMSSW_9_0_X #17512 (original by @cms-l1t-offline). Please wait for a new IB (12 to 24H) before requesting to test this PR.
title: Pr90x l1t prescales from payloads
